block.p: Katherine Lane Armfield, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Howard M. Armfield of Middleburg, Va., was married at her parents' house last evening to Lee Russell Kaiser, the son of Judy Kaiser of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y., and the late Jacob S. Kaiser. The Rev. Robert Marshall, a Methodist minister, officiated.
Mrs. Kaiser, 27, is the production and marketing coordinator at Armfield, Harrison & Thomas Insurance, in Leesburg, Va. She graduated from Duke University.

Katherine Lane Armfield, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Howard M. Armfield of Middleburg, Va., was married at her parents' house last evening to Lee Russell Kaiser, the son of Judy Kaiser of Hastings-on-Hudson, N.Y., and the late Jacob S. Kaiser. The Rev. Robert Marshall, a Methodist minister, officiated.
Mrs. Kaiser, 27, is the production and marketing coordinator at Armfield, Harrison & Thomas Insurance, in Leesburg, Va. She graduated from Duke University.
Mr. Kaiser, 25, teaches the sixth grade at the Springfield Estates Elementary School in Springfield, Va. He graduated from the State University College at Oswego, N.Y. WEDDINGS
